756640.name: Welcome to Orochi Park
756640.description:
An interactive fiction adventure-strategy parody. Send agents on missions, build your base, research occult superweapons and buy units. Along the way, unlock occult mysteries. Plus romance Kelly from Mass Effect. You play the demo now for free.

The demo is very much in an alpha state. After feedback both good and bad, the game is being substantially improved and the new demo will release later this year. I appreciate if you wish to try the game out. However, it currently has a confusing plotline and game mechanics that are being worked on.

This is a screenshot from the beta, due out September 2018:
756640.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
